entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -7.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries or rain showers beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon then west 50 gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
